name: curl_setopt
purpose: Set an option for a cURL transfer

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
Passing an array to CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS will 
    encode the data as multipart/form-data,
    while passing a URL-encoded string will encode the data as
    application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

changelog.change:
Introduced CURLOPT_AUTOREFERER,
        CURLOPT_BINARYTRANSFER,
        CURLOPT_FTPSSLAUTH,
        CURLOPT_PROXYAUTH, and
        CURLOPT_TIMECONDITION.

Introduced CURLOPT_FTP_USE_EPRT,
        CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL,
        CURLOPT_UNRESTRICTED_AUTH,
        CURLOPT_BUFFERSIZE,
        CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH,
        CURLOPT_PROXYPORT,
        CURLOPT_PROXYTYPE,
        CURLOPT_SSLCERTTYPE, and
        CURLOPT_HTTP200ALIASES.
